name: The Sun Instruments
description:
The Sun Instruments is a small game prototype made for the IceHouse Game-jam 2019.

You are a monk, your master is missing and you must find him, and three mystical objects the next Emperor of Japan need to be enthroned.

/!\ There is a big bug in the second puzzle, don't use the 3 objects buttons from the right in the left room (see the 3rd screenshot) or you will have to restart the game . 

This game is off competition because I'm a judge of the Icehouse Jam, it is just made for learning.

Information

It's made with Visionaire-Studio

The sound is from https://www.humblebundle.com/software/sound-fx-software

The rest is from me.

Warning

This prototype is highly unfinished and can be finished in 3 minutes.

The Art of the game hasn't been made yet and it still use placeholders.

Only the very beginning of the game is available.

This game was made for learning purposes and will not be developed further.
